title: Parallel Acceleration of WAH Queries
description: Developed highly parallel range queries to be run on Nvidia graphics cards. Excecution times were compared to a parallel implementation run on a CPU.

title: Farm Connect
description: Created a web application for farmers to check on the progress of crops gorwn by local farmers along with data about their crops. The tool can also be used as a personal photo tracking system to monitor growth from year to year.

title: Process Scheduler
description: Processes Scheduler built to handle First Come First Serve, Round Robin, Preemptive Priority, and Shortest Job First scheduling algorithms.

title: Pipelined Processor Simulator
description: Processes and simulates behavior for a custom instruction set. The processor has a five stage pipeline.

title: Sign Finder
description: Created a tracking application for temporary construction signs using Google Maps API and JavaScript.

title: Group Chat Server
description: Implemented a group messaging server that sends encrypted messages to everyone logged in
